presentationTable.name: Budget (STAT)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis

presentationColumns.name: Budget Activity (STAT)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the specified accounts in STAT currency. Where Budget Activity (STAT) = Sum of Debit (STAT) - Sum of Credit (STAT).
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis

presentationColumns.name: Budget Debit (STAT)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of debit entries amount for the specified accounts in STAT currency.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis

presentationColumns.name: Budget Credit (STAT)
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of credit entries amount for specified accounts in STAT currency.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - GL Budgets Analysis
